overview: Nick shares an apartment with his two good friends. Nick, obsessed with horror films and serial killers, is always convinced he's in the middle of one. His two roommates have learned to live with his odd behavior and sometimes even find it amusing. When the apartment building gets a new handyman, "Breno", Nick's imagination goes into overdrive. His friends are intrigued by Breno's dark good looks and elusive demeanor while Nick is convinced they have a serial killer in their midst. It's not long before a series of misunderstandings, nightmares and mistaken identities send all four guys into a tailspin of darkness and classic horror violence. Who knew apartment life could be so dangerous?
title: The Handyman
